dialogue:
[header name:Worried Adult]
Are you well rested for the journey?

[newpage wait:1.2]
[header name:Worried Adult]
Remember that to get a new hand of cards, [pause value:.25]and 
restart your [color value:pp]Focus,[pause value:.25]
[color value:regular] you need to 
[color value:blue]hold A.[color value:regular]

[newpage wait:3.3]
[header name:Worried Adult]
However, that costs you [color value:pp][endl]
Play Points (PP).[color value:regular] [pause value:.5]You can get some of my [color value:pp]food
[color value:regular] [style value:wave][sprite id:food/scale:.7][style value:none] if you need to 
 replenish some...
name: Adult 1
